vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor(uint256 rate, address wallet, IERC20 token) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.rate (local variable @ AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#276) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (function @ AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#317-320)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor(uint256 rate, address wallet, IERC20 token) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.wallet (local variable @ AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#276) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.wallet (function @ AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#310-313)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor(uint256 rate, address wallet, IERC20 token) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.token (local variable @ AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#276) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (function @ AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#303-306)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
AllowanceCrowdsale.constructor.tokenWallet (local variable @ AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#514) shadows:
	- AllowanceCrowdsale.tokenWallet (function @ AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#522-525)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Crowdsale.wallet (AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#310-313) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: Crowdsale.rate (AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#317-320) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: AllowanceCrowdsale.remainingTokens (AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#530-536) should be declared external
